Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 28 Sep 2018It's not about how much you're paying.It's about having enough coverage.Rule of thumbs are:10 X Annual Income for Death cover 
3-5 X Annual Income for CI coverTerm or Whole Life would be up to you. For my clients we do some term, some whole life (mainly for CI). Don't count your savings plan as a protection product. It's not. It's a savings product. 0 comments0
